name: Crossover Battles: Battleship takedown
description:
The multi verse has fallen into chaos and destruction. A few universes have been saved, but the enemy is in the process of setting a revenge plan in motion. Think you have what it takes to save the worlds?

Glide over gaps, sneak past lasers, use an electronic future sense gadget and speed your way to find out what the revenge plan is. 

Play time casually: About 1 hour from start to finish (with deaths)

Level count: 4

(This game will be a bit rough simply because this is my first one)
